body:
I have stopped coming onto Minecraft (and Avicus) for some time now. I've been moving towards more mobile games and now I feel like Avicus is declining massively on players. There used to be 30 people on, but now there are maybe 10. Avicus has always had a special place in my heart, I go on the server whenever I am bored (for the past 1 1/2 years). But, every good story has an ending and I feel as if this is the end.

<3 Thanks to all my great friends who have come along this journey and played with me. <3

Good Luck Avicus,
Every Good Story Has An Ending

-Mw
